did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, news clippings, scripts, programs, playbills, lecture notes, theater notes, photographs, recordings and other memorabilia.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, news clippings, scripts, programs, playbills, lecture notes, theater notes, photographs, recordings and other memorabilia relating to various aspects of the field of Speech and Drama.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Professor of Speech and Drama, Cornell University.
Organized the Cornell Dramatic Club and was its Director from 1912-1947. Wrote original plays and a monograph on play production.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, news clippings, scripts, programs, playbills, lecture notes, theater notes, photographs, recordings and other memorabilia relating to various aspects of the field of Speech and Drama.
Includes charcoal drawing of Professor Drummond by Christian Midjo.
Includes correspondence from Eugene O'Neill, Oscar Hammerstein II, George Bernard Shaw and Hendrik Van Loon.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University. Speech and Drama Dept.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Alexander M. Drummond papers, #14-24-435. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
